description: Demolition of existing Boot House and erection of new two-storey dwelling with porch and rear dormer. Bin store to front garden and front boundary wall. Cycle storage to rear garden. Instillation of air source heat pump and photovoltaic panels. [Non-material amendment to planning approval 23/0291/FUL to allow for changes to locations of windows and roof skylights.  Removal of ground floor skylight to satisfy Part O of the Building Regulations (related to Overheating), Changes to front garden access to satisfy Building Regulation M4(2) (related to Accessibility), Front gate wall: brick wall without metal railing above.]
decision_conditions: For the avoidance of doubt the documents/drawing(s) No(s) to which this decision refers are as follows:- A1.0 Rev 3, A1.1 Rev 3, A1.2 Rev 4, A1.3 Rev 5, A2.1 Rev 4, A2.2 Rev 3, A2.3 Rev 3 & A3.0 Rev 2 received on 06 Jun 2025 and A2.0 Rev 4 received on 09 Jun 2025.
